Container.Name: twitch2tuner
Container.Overview: A tuner emulator to play Twitch in Plex
Container.Description: A tuner emulator to play Twitch in Plex

Config.Name: Client ID
Config.Description: The ID of the client to access the Twitch API

Config.Name: Client Secret
Config.Description: The secret of the client to access the Twitch API

Config.Name: Username
Config.Description: The username of the user whose followed channels should be loaded

Config.Name: Stream Utility
Config.Description: The name of the utility for extracting stream URLs (either YOUTUBE_DL or STREAMLINK).

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: The external port to reach this service. Maps to container port 22708.
